landingPage.resumeText: Fascinated by IT and its security issues, I am moving into the cybersecurity profession. Creative and perseverant, I like to take on challenges as a team to respond to current challenges in terms of IT security.

forensique.title: Forensics
forensique.contentText: Strong knowledge of basic principles of computer forensics, including methods of data acquisition, data analysis, and evidence presentation.

devsecops.title: DevSecOps
devsecops.contentText: Strong understanding of development, IT security and regulatory compliance. Proficient in CI/CD, network security, penetration testing.

pentesting.title: Pentesting
pentesting.contentText: Penetration testing and common vulnerabilities. Reconnaissance, exploitation, post-exploitation and reporting. Identification and correction of vulnerabilities to ensure the security of systems and networks.

developpement.title: Developement
developpement.contentText: Expertise in Python, JavaScript, Bash, Docker and others. Advanced use of Github for version management and collaboration on personal and professional projects.

aboutMePage.title: WHOAMI
aboutMePage.paragraph_one: Hello there! ðŸ‘‹ I'm a computer engineering graduate with a knack for navigating the digital realm.
aboutMePage.paragraph_two: My journey has been fueled by a passion for cybersecurity, where I find my stride in the thrilling world of CTF games. Armed with a degree and a determination to unravel the complexities of the virtual landscape, I'm on a quest for continuous learning and cyber adventures.
aboutMePage.paragraph_three: I bring hands-on experience in digital forensics, android security, red & blue team functionalities coupled with proficiency in Linux, Python & SQL. My passion lies in automating and scripting Linux environments, complemented by strong networking, programming, analysis, and problem-solving skills. Eager to translate my expertise into real-world scenarios, I am actively seeking entry-level positions in the cybersecurity industry. My goal is to learn from seasoned professionals, contribute to organizational security, and cultivate practical experience in the field.
